Text: Is it possible to make a portable vers of the latest Spotify ? I cannot find any good upload on PB

@jersson
I see that you already got the latest version of Spotify here on TPB, and you don't need anything else to make it portable, the program is already a standalone. Just install it in Sandboxie, retrieve the spotify.exe and here you go... :o)

damn you are good tooooo good!!!!to be true!!!
thanks mate.
